_header: I boast and brag ay with the best
Note: For MSS with an introductory couplet see 6643.
Bibliographic Ghosts: Oxford, Corpus Christi College 155, f. 161-164v: see 6643; Cambridge UK, Jesus College Q.G.3 (51), ff. 12-14: see 6643; Cambridge UK, Pembroke College 285, ff. 13-15v: see 6643.
_description: The Seven Deadly Sins in the Speculum Christiani (Quarta Tabula) — seven quatrains

BodDou107.First Lines:
I bost and bragge ay with þe bestTo maynteyne synne I am ful
                    prest…
BodDou107.Last Lines:
…fro synful lust wyl y not fleþowȝ y for it in helle
                    ay schuld be
BodDou107.Note:
Verses are inserted among Latin prose and written in long lines. Names
                    of the deadly sins are written in the margins.
